channel.title: aws on Nicole van der Hoeven
channel.description: Recent content in aws on Nicole van der Hoeven

item.title: Week of Testing: Day 2 - Comparing tests against a baseline
item.description: Day 2 of my Week of Testing! Yesterday I ran my first load test on k6, and actually set up the thresholds wrong. I still maintain that there are some UI improvements that could still be made in that area, and that feedback was well-received. Apparently I’m not the only one who has made the same mistake. Today I learned that on k6, you can actually set one test to be a baseline.

item.title: Week of Testing: Day 1 - Running a load test on k6
item.description: On my first real day of testing with k6.io, I wanted to jump right in and figure out how to run a load test on k6 Cloud. k6 has documentation on this, but I didn’t use it for this test, since the point of a week of testing is to record how easy the product is to use. My verdict: I’m pleasantly surprised with how easily everything went.
